content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the court ruled in favor of the applicants and ordered the defendant to pay the debt divide the property and provide compensation the court also discussed the allocation of costs in the case the defendant was ordered to pay the claimants proportionally to the claims upheld and the total costs of the proceedings amounted to eur 325440 the court allocated 50 of the costs to the defendant due to their inconsistent procedural behavior the court also ordered the payment of a debt and financial compensation between the parties as well as the division of property

metadata.subject_of_succession: Matrimonial Property: Immovable property: the treatment room, the apartment 1 and the garage attached to the apartment, the car, the apartment 2
